parameters.name: badge_action[action_type]
parameters.description: The internal name of the badge action.

parameters.name: badge_action[identifier]
parameters.description: The identifier for this badge action.

badge_action_count.description: Number of times the badge action has been completed.

badge_awarded.description: Whether or not the badge has been awarded.

internal_name.description: Internal name of the badge. Supports alphanumeric and underscore characters.

picture_url.description: The URL for the attached badge icon.

action_requirement.description: The number of times the action must be completed.

point_value.description: The amount of points the badge gives upon being awarded.

post.summary: Create an activity for the quest

parameters.name: quest_id
parameters.description: ID of the quest the activity is being created for

get.summary: Get all the rewards for the current user's product.

parameters.name: reward[deleted]
parameters.description: Determines if the reward has been soft deleted.

parameters.name: reward[updated_at]
parameters.description: The date and time the reward was last updated at.

parameters.name: reward[created_at]
parameters.description: The date and time the reward was created.

parameters.name: reward[action_type_id]
parameters.description: The action type id.

parameters.name: reward[reward_type_id]
parameters.description: The id of the type that is rewarded. Ex. If the type is badge, it would be the id of the badge that this reward gives.

parameters.name: reward[reward_type]
parameters.description: Type of reward. Enumerable.

parameters.name: reward[internal_name]
parameters.description: Internal name of the reward.  May contain alphanumeric characters and underscores. Unique

parameters.name: reward[name]
parameters.description: Name of the reward

parameters.name: reward[product_id]
parameters.description: The product id the reward belongs to.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Internal name of the product to set the reward for. (Super Admin Only)

parameters.name: reward[series]
parameters.description: The series this reward belongs to. This allows chaining of rewards. Ex: You have 3 rewards. 1 for using the app for 15 minutes, 1 for 30 minutes, 1 for 60 minutes. All 3 would belong to use_app_x_minutes series.

parameters.name: reward[action_requirement]
parameters.description: The number of times this action needs to be completed to receive this reward. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: reward[points]
parameters.description: The amount of points this reward contributes towards a level. Default is 0.

parameters.name: reward[status]
parameters.description: Determines if the reward is available to be attached to other systems. Defaults to active.
